TestCase.name: testSingleCall
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(a) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])
AsyncCalc(select=[func1(a) AS EXPR$0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testLiteralPlusTableSelect
TestCase.Resource: SELECT 'foo', func1(a) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[_UTF-16LE'foo'], EXPR$1=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=['foo' AS EXPR$0, f0 AS EXPR$1]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func1(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testFieldPlusTableSelect
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, func1(a) from MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])
AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS EXPR$1], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testTwoCalls
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(a), func1(a) from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1($0)], EXPR$1=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

AsyncCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, func1(a) AS EXPR$1], syncMode=[false]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testNestedCalls
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(func1(func1(a))) from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1(func1(func1($0)))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

AsyncCalc(select=[func1(f0) AS EXPR$0], syncMode=[false]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func1(f0) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func1(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testThreeNestedCalls
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(func1(a)), func1(func1(func1(a))), func1(a) from MyTable

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1(func1($0))], EXPR$1=[func1(func1(func1($0)))], EXPR$2=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

AsyncCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, func1(f1) AS EXPR$1, f2 AS EXPR$2], syncMode=[false]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[f2, f0, func1(f1) AS f1], syncMode=[false]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[f2, f1, func1(f0) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[f0, f00 AS f1, func1(a) AS f2], syncMode=[false]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[f0, a, func1(a) AS f00], syncMode=[false]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testPassedToOtherUDF
TestCase.Resource: SELECT Concat(func2(a), 'foo') from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CONCAT(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'foo')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=[CONCAT(f0, 'foo') AS EXPR$0]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func2(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testJustCall
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(1)
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1(1)]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])
AsyncCalc(select=[func1(1) AS EXPR$0], syncMode=[false]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])

TestCase.name: testWhereCondition
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a from MyTable where REGEXP(func2(a), 'string (2|3)')

LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'string (2|3)')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'string (2|3)')]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testWhereConditionAndProjection
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func2(a) from MyTable where REGEXP(func2(a), 'val (2|3)')

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func2($0)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'val (2|3)')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

AsyncCalc(select=[func2(a) AS EXPR$0], syncMode=[false]) +- Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'val (2|3)')]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testWhereConditionWithInts
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a from MyTable where func1(a) >= 12
LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=(func1($0), 12)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=[a], where=[>=(f0, 12)]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testAggregate
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, func3(count(*)) from MyTable group by a

LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[func3($1)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

AsyncCalc(select=[a, func3($f1) AS EXPR$1], syncMode=[false]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, COUNT(*) AS $f1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectCallWithIntArray
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func4(d) from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func4($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])
AsyncCalc(select=[func4(d) AS EXPR$0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testFieldAccessAfter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func5(a).f0 from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func5($0).f0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=[f0.f0 AS EXPR$0]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func5(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testFieldOperand
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(func5(a).f0) from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1(func5($0).f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

AsyncCalc(select=[func1(f0) AS EXPR$0], syncMode=[false]) +- Calc(select=[f0.f0 AS f0]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func5(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])
